Method Detail

writeBooleanMatrix

public void writeBooleanMatrix(boolean[] matrix)
                        throws java.io.IOException
Writes the boolean 1D matrix, and compresses it so 8 booleans are in a single byte.

Parameters:
matrix - the boolean matrix.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if an error occurs while writing into the stream.

writeBooleanMatrix

public void writeBooleanMatrix(boolean[][] matrix)
                        throws java.io.IOException

Parameters:
matrix - the boolean matrix.

java.io.IOException - if an error occurs while writing into the stream.

writeIntMatrix

public void writeIntMatrix(int[] matrix)
                    throws java.io.IOException
Writes the integer 1D matrix, and compresses it so every integer takes 1 to 5 bytes, depending on their size.

Parameters:
matrix - the integer matrix.

writeVarint

public void writeVarint(int value)
                 throws java.io.IOException
Writes the signed integer with the varint algorithm, so it takes 1 to 5 bytes, depending on its size. This signed integer is signed by the Zig-Zag encoding, so negative numbers are not interpreted as big varints.

Parameters:
value - the integer value.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if an error occurs while writing into the stream.

writeUnsignedVarint

public void writeUnsignedVarint(int value)
                         throws java.io.IOException
Writes the unsigned integer with the varint algorithm, so it takes 1 to 5 bytes, depending on its size.

Parameters:
value - the integer value.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if an error occurs while writing into the stream.

writeVariant

                  throws java.io.IOException
Writes the variant, preceded by its type.

Parameters:
variant - the variant to write.

java.io.IOException - if an error occurs while writing into the stream.

writeVariantValue

public void writeVariantValue(Variant variant)
                       throws java.io.IOException
Writes the variant value, without its type.

Parameters:
variant - the variant to write.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if an error occurs while writing into the stream.

encodeZigZag

private int encodeZigZag(int value)
Encodes the given number with the Zig-Zag encoding, so negative numbers are not interpreted as big varints.

Parameters:
value - the value to encode.
Returns:
the encoded value.

initializeVarboolWriting

private void initializeVarboolWriting()
Initializes the class instance attributes in order to write a varbool matrix.

bufferizeVarbool

private void bufferizeVarbool(boolean value)
                       throws java.io.IOException
Bufferizes a boolean into the current byte and writes it if it is full. This function must be called between a call to initializeVarboolWriting and a call to writeVarboolRemainder.

Parameters:
value - the boolean to bufferize.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if an error occurs while writing into the stream.

writeVarboolRemainder

private void writeVarboolRemainder()
                            throws java.io.IOException
Writes the remaining booleans into the stream. After this function is called, no other bufferizeVarbool calls shall be made.

Throws:
java.io.IOException - if an error occurs while writing into the stream.
